attributes.action: encourage schools to give necessary recognition to high-achieving pupils rather than focussing on those who do not wish to learn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a high-achieving student in a Catholic High School in Norfolk, I believe that those students who do push themselves and work hard every day in all aspects of their education should be given adequate recognition. If is currently the situation where students who are not putting an ounce of effort into their education are being rewarded because "it'll encourage them to try harder". Some students go far beyond the call of duty as a pupil, and go almost completely unnoticed by staff and students
